Routing Guide

PhilJS Router provides file-based routing with nested layouts, data loading, and type-safe navigation.

Installation

Terminal
$npm install philjs-router

File-Based Routing

Routes are defined by the file structure in your routes/ directory:

File Structuretext
1routes/
2├── index.tsx          → /
3├── about.tsx          → /about
4├── blog/
5│   ├── index.tsx      → /blog
6│   └── [slug].tsx     → /blog/:slug
7├── users/
8│   ├── index.tsx      → /users
9│   ├── [id].tsx       → /users/:id
10│   └── [id]/
11│       ├── posts.tsx  → /users/:id/posts
12│       └── settings.tsx → /users/:id/settings
13└── [...all].tsx       → /* (catch-all)

Route Conventions

PatternExampleMatches
index.tsxroutes/index.tsx/
name.tsxroutes/about.tsx/about
[param].tsxroutes/users/[id].tsx/users/123
[...rest].tsxroutes/docs/[...path].tsx/docs/a/b/c
_layout.tsxroutes/dashboard/_layout.tsxWraps nested routes
_error.tsxroutes/_error.tsxError boundary

Basic Routing

Basic Routestsx
1// routes/index.tsx
2export default function Home() {
3  return (
4    <main>
5      <h1>Welcome to PhilJS</h1>
6      <p>A modern web framework</p>
7    </main>
8  );
9}
10 
11// routes/about.tsx
12export default function About() {
13  return (
14    <main>
15      <h1>About Us</h1>
16    </main>
17  );
18}

Dynamic Routes

Dynamic Routestsx
1// routes/users/[id].tsx
2import { useParams } from 'philjs-router';
3 
4export default function UserPage() {
5  const params = useParams<{ id: string }>();
6 
7  return (
8    <main>
9      <h1>User {params.id}</h1>
10    </main>
11  );
12}
13 
14// routes/blog/[...slug].tsx - Catch-all route
15export default function BlogPost() {
16  const params = useParams<{ slug: string[] }>();
17  const path = params.slug.join('/');
18 
19  return (
20    <main>
21      <h1>Blog: {path}</h1>
22    </main>
23  );
24}

Layouts

Use _layout.tsx files to wrap child routes with shared UI:

Layoutstsx
1// routes/_layout.tsx - Root layout
2import { Outlet } from 'philjs-router';
3 
4export default function RootLayout() {
5  return (
6    <div class="app">
7      <header>
8        <nav>
9          <a href="/">Home</a>
10          <a href="/about">About</a>
11          <a href="/dashboard">Dashboard</a>
12        </nav>
13      </header>
14 
15      <main>
16        <Outlet /> {/* Child routes render here */}
17      </main>
18 
19      <footer>
20        <p>&copy; 2024 My App</p>
21      </footer>
22    </div>
23  );
24}
25 
26// routes/dashboard/_layout.tsx - Nested layout
27export default function DashboardLayout() {
28  return (
29    <div class="dashboard">
30      <aside class="sidebar">
31        <nav>
32          <a href="/dashboard">Overview</a>
33          <a href="/dashboard/analytics">Analytics</a>
34          <a href="/dashboard/settings">Settings</a>
35        </nav>
36      </aside>
37 
38      <div class="content">
39        <Outlet />
40      </div>
41    </div>
42  );
43}

Navigation

Link Component

Navigation.tsxtsx
1import { A, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'philjs-router';
2 
3function Navigation() {
4  const location = useLocation();
5  const navigate = useNavigate();
6 
7  return (
8    <nav>
9      {/* Declarative navigation */}
10      <A
11        href="/"
12        class="nav-link"
13        activeClass="active"
14      >
15        Home
16      </A>
17 
18      <A
19        href="/dashboard"
20        class="nav-link"
21        activeClass="active"
22        end={false} // Match child routes too
23      >
24        Dashboard
25      </A>
26 
27      {/* Programmatic navigation */}
28      <button onClick={() => navigate('/login')}>
29        Login
30      </button>
31 
32      {/* Navigate with state */}
33      <button onClick={() => navigate('/checkout', {
34        state: { from: location.pathname }
35      })}>
36        Checkout
37      </button>
38 
39      {/* Replace history */}
40      <button onClick={() => navigate('/new-page', { replace: true })}>
41        Replace
42      </button>
43    </nav>
44  );
45}

Prefetching

Prefetching.tsxtsx
1import { A } from 'philjs-router';
2 
3function ProductList({ products }) {
4  return (
5    <ul>
6      <For each={products}>
7        {(product) => (
8          <li>
9            {/* Prefetch on hover */}
10            <A
11              href={`/products/${product.id}`}
12              prefetch="hover"
13            >
14              {product.name}
15            </A>
16 
17            {/* Prefetch when visible */}
18            <A
19              href={`/products/${product.id}`}
20              prefetch="viewport"
21            >
22              {product.name}
23            </A>
24 
25            {/* Prefetch intent (hover + focus) */}
26            <A
27              href={`/products/${product.id}`}
28              prefetch="intent"
29            >
30              {product.name}
31            </A>
32          </li>
33        )}
34      </For>
35    </ul>
36  );
37}

Data Loading

Load data for routes using loaders:

DataLoading.tsxtsx
1// routes/users/[id].tsx
2import { createRouteLoader, useLoaderData, useParams } from 'philjs-router';
3 
4// Loader runs on server (SSR) or before navigation (SPA)
5export const loader = createRouteLoader(async ({ params }) => {
6  const user = await db.users.find(params.id);
7 
8  if (!user) {
9    throw new Response('Not Found', { status: 404 });
10  }
11 
12  const posts = await db.posts.findMany({
13    where: { authorId: user.id },
14    take: 10,
15  });
16 
17  return { user, posts };
18});
19 
20export default function UserPage() {
21  const data = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();
22 
23  return (
24    <main>
25      <h1>{data.user.name}</h1>
26      <p>{data.user.bio}</p>
27 
28      <h2>Recent Posts</h2>
29      <ul>
30        <For each={data.posts}>
31          {(post) => (
32            <li>
33              <A href={`/blog/${post.slug}`}>{post.title}</A>
34            </li>
35          )}
36        </For>
37      </ul>
38    </main>
39  );
40}

Parallel Data Loading

ParallelLoading.tsxtypescript
1export const loader = createRouteLoader(async ({ params }) => {
2  // Parallel data fetching
3  const [user, posts, followers] = await Promise.all([
4    db.users.find(params.id),
5    db.posts.findMany({ where: { authorId: params.id } }),
6    db.followers.count({ where: { followingId: params.id } }),
7  ]);
8 
9  return { user, posts, followers };
10});

Form Actions

FormActions.tsxtsx
1// routes/settings.tsx
2import { createAction, useActionData, Form } from 'philjs-router';
3 
4export const action = createAction(async ({ request }) => {
5  const formData = await request.formData();
6  const name = formData.get('name');
7  const email = formData.get('email');
8 
9  // Validate
10  const errors: Record<string, string> = {};
11  if (!name) errors.name = 'Name is required';
12  if (!email) errors.email = 'Email is required';
13 
14  if (Object.keys(errors).length) {
15    return { errors };
16  }
17 
18  // Update user
19  await db.users.update({
20    where: { id: currentUser.id },
21    data: { name, email },
22  });
23 
24  return { success: true };
25});
26 
27export default function Settings() {
28  const actionData = useActionData<typeof action>();
29 
30  return (
31    <Form method="post">
32      <div>
33        <label>Name</label>
34        <input name="name" />
35        <Show when={actionData?.errors?.name}>
36          <span class="error">{actionData.errors.name}</span>
37        </Show>
38      </div>
39 
40      <div>
41        <label>Email</label>
42        <input name="email" type="email" />
43        <Show when={actionData?.errors?.email}>
44          <span class="error">{actionData.errors.email}</span>
45        </Show>
46      </div>
47 
48      <Show when={actionData?.success}>
49        <div class="success">Settings saved!</div>
50      </Show>
51 
52      <button type="submit">Save</button>
53    </Form>
54  );
55}

Protected Routes

ProtectedRoutes.tsxtsx
1// routes/dashboard/_layout.tsx
2import { createRouteLoader, redirect, Outlet } from 'philjs-router';
3import { getSession } from '../lib/auth';
4 
5export const loader = createRouteLoader(async ({ request }) => {
6  const session = await getSession(request);
7 
8  if (!session) {
9    // Redirect to login with return URL
10    const url = new URL(request.url);
11    throw redirect(`/login?returnTo=${url.pathname}`);
12  }
13 
14  return { user: session.user };
15});
16 
17export default function DashboardLayout() {
18  const { user } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();
19 
20  return (
21    <div class="dashboard">
22      <header>
23        <span>Welcome, {user.name}</span>
24        <form method="post" action="/logout">
25          <button type="submit">Logout</button>
26        </form>
27      </header>
28      <Outlet />
29    </div>
30  );
31}

Route Meta

RouteMeta.tsxtsx
1// routes/blog/[slug].tsx
2import { createRouteMeta, useRouteMeta } from 'philjs-router';
3 
4export const meta = createRouteMeta(({ data }) => {
5  return [
6    { title: data.post.title },
7    { name: 'description', content: data.post.excerpt },
8    { property: 'og:title', content: data.post.title },
9    { property: 'og:image', content: data.post.image },
10  ];
11});
12 
13export const loader = createRouteLoader(async ({ params }) => {
14  const post = await db.posts.findBySlug(params.slug);
15  return { post };
16});
17 
18export default function BlogPost() {
19  const { post } = useLoaderData<typeof loader>();
20 
21  return (
22    <article>
23      <h1>{post.title}</h1>
24      <div innerHTML={post.content} />
25    </article>
26  );
27}

Error Handling

ErrorHandling.tsxtsx
1// routes/_error.tsx - Global error boundary
2export default function ErrorPage({ error }: { error: Error }) {
3  return (
4    <div class="error-page">
5      <h1>Oops!</h1>
6      <p>{error.message}</p>
7      <a href="/">Go Home</a>
8    </div>
9  );
10}
11 
12// routes/users/_error.tsx - Nested error boundary
13export default function UserErrorPage({ error }: { error: Error }) {
14  if (error.status === 404) {
15    return (
16      <div>
17        <h1>User Not Found</h1>
18        <a href="/users">Browse Users</a>
19      </div>
20    );
21  }
22 
23  return (
24    <div>
25      <h1>Error Loading User</h1>
26      <p>{error.message}</p>
27    </div>
28  );
29}

Scroll Restoration

ScrollRestoration.tsxtsx
1import { Router, ScrollRestoration } from 'philjs-router';
2 
3function App() {
4  return (
5    <Router>
6      {/* Automatically restores scroll position */}
7      <ScrollRestoration />
8 
9      <Routes />
10    </Router>
11  );
12}
13 
14// Manual scroll control
15import { useScrollToTop } from 'philjs-router';
16 
17function ProductList() {
18  const scrollToTop = useScrollToTop();
19 
20  return (
21    <div>
22      {/* ... */}
23      <button onClick={() => scrollToTop()}>
24        Back to Top
25      </button>
26    </div>
27  );
28}
